Sentencas: The use of pulsed laser deposition to produce high-quality manganese cobaltite spinet coatings on Crofer 22 APU substrates has been investigated, and the microstructures of the coatings have been studied using a combination of X-ray diffraction and electron microscopy techniques.
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: It is shown that deposition from ceramic Mn1.5Co1.5O4 targets at a chamber pressure of 2.8 x 10(-4)
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: mTorr N-2 with the substrate pre-heated to 400 degrees C resulted in smooth, dense polycrystalline coatings.
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: These coatings contain a mixture of rock-salt (Mn,Co)O and FCC Co phases due to reduction of the target material in the plume during deposition.
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: Post-deposition annealing at atmospheric pressure in laboratory air at 800 degrees C led to re-oxidation of the coatings to give spinet phases with a thin chromia layer at the interface with the substrate.
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: An annealing time of 0.5 h resulted in a coating with a fine uniform mixture of tetragonal and cubic spinet phases.
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: The presence of pores at the location of the prior Co grains and at the original coating surface was used to infer the mechanisms by which the re-oxidation occurs.
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: An annealing time of 14 h led to phase segregation in the coatings with more Co-rich cubic spinet at the surface and at the coating/substrate interface, and more Mn-rich tetragonal spinet in the center of the coating.
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: There is Cr in the cubic phase only, indicating that the phase segregation occurs due to outward diffusion of Cr from the substrate through the chromia layer.
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: There are local variations in the porosity and surface morphology of the coating, which appear to be correlated with the orientation of the underlying substrate grains.
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: These observations indicate that control of grain structure in the substrate may be necessary to promote microstructural stability in such coatings.
Titulo: Microstructural evolution in manganese cobaltite films grown on Crofer 22 APU substrates by pulsed laser deposition
